summary: Backend admin verification was updated to use password "2026edit". The diff summary asserts frontend fixes (No-button clamping and admin UI repair), but the provided frontend/index.html content is heavily truncated and does not include the relevant JS/logic, so those frontend requirements cannot be verified from the available evidence. Several additional Valentine-page features appear to have been added that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the evasive “No” button behavior in `frontend/index.html` so it always remains fully within the visible browser viewport (including after the first move), stays clickable, and continues to evade the cursor for up to 10 moves as intended.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows truncated CSS/HTML for `frontend/index.html` and does not include the JS/positioning logic needed to confirm viewport clamping, clickability after the first move, exactly/up-to 10 evasive moves, or resize/rotation handling.

missing_requirements.requirement: Repair the hidden admin interface in `frontend/index.html` so logging in with username `akash` and password `2026edit` works, and the admin can update the BF name, GF name, and the main message as intended.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show the admin UI/login logic, hidden trigger mechanism, incorrect-credential error messaging, or live-update wiring; `frontend/index.html` is truncated before any relevant script and the change summary is not sufficient to verify implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/implemented “Forever audio autoplay” on the Valentine page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 and is outside the stated non-goals (not needed for fixing No-button bounds or admin login/update).

hallucinated_features.description: Added a “boba tea question” flow with backend response recording.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements only mention fixing the No button and repairing/admin-verification for the hidden admin interface.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an admin “response viewer” for stored responses.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; REQ-2 only requires updating BF/GF names and main message.

hallucinated_features.description: Added “corner image configuration” and additional Valentine decorations/graphics (cats/chocolates/teddy/background canvas).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; explicitly outside the scope of fixing the specific bugs without redesigning the overall experience flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed React app behavior to redirect to standalone HTML page while preserving query parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; the BuildRequest scope is limited to `frontend/index.html` fixes plus backend password verification.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a TypeScript backend client wrapper (`frontend/src/valentine/backendClient.ts`) with actor initialization and helper functions.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested explicitly; requirements do not ask for new frontend client abstractions.
